description: Try our easy to follow Chocolate Rum & Raisin Pudding recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chocolate Rum & Raisin Pudding Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 60g reduced-fat dairy blend, at room temperature

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Grease a 6-cup ovenproof dish.

Spread both sides of bread with dairy blend. Combine chocolate and raisins in a bowl. Sprinkle chocolate mixture over half of the bread slices. Top with remaining slices and press down firmly. Cut each into 4 triangles. Arrange in prepared dish.
Whisk cream, milk, sugar, eggs, rum essence and vanilla extract in a bowl. Carefully pour over sandwiches.
Bake for 45 mins or until custard is set when tested in the centre with a skewer. Stand for 5 minutes. Sprinkle with icing sugar and serve.
